skillTree.name: War Boar (Mount)
skillTree.description: Enables the War Boar mount

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "Da Lazt Un Iz a Sfinkin Rut!", while this Mount is equipped, for Orc Boar Rider and Chariot units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Wyvern (Mount)
skillTree.description: Enables the Wyvern mount

skillTree.name: A True Orc
skillTree.description: Dis orc duz not need ta wear shiny stuff ta be 'da ardest an meanest greenskin around!

skillTree.name: Da Old Wayz
skillTree.description: The standards of Savage Orc tribes are considered primitive and backwards even by most orcs and goblins and only the most feral greenskins and monsters will find them appealing

effects.description:
Morale: +5% for Savage Orc, Forest Goblin, Troll and Monster (excluding Squig) units
	(Lord's army)

Replenishment Bonus: +5% for Savage Orc, Troll and Monster (excluding Squig) units
	(Lord's army)

Morale: +10% for Savage Orc, Forest Goblin, Troll and Monster (excluding Squig) units
	(Lord's army)

Replenishment Bonus: +10% for Savage Orc, Troll and Monster (excluding Squig) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Choppas
skillTree.description: Orc choppas are crude and hefty blades usually swung with violent joy by their owner. A choppa in full swing can have a brutal, crunching impact on the poor fool on the receiving end.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Letz Show'em oos Da Boss
skillTree.description: Savage orcs konsida all otha orcs are too soft, us'n metal and uver stuff... even an unnatural kontrapshun dey call "wheelz"!! itÂ´s time dey learn 'oo are da true followaz uv Gork anâ€™ Mork!

skillTree.name: Bigga iz Betta
skillTree.description: Lacking any kind of technology more advanced than stone weapons, Savage Orcs must rely only in physical strength and endurance to beat down their enemies. And itÂ´s often enough.

effects.description:
Physical Resistance: +10% for melee infantry Savage Orc units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +8% for melee infantry Savage Orc units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resistance: +15% for melee infantry Savage Orc units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +12% for melee infantry Savage Orc units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resistance: +20% for melee infantry Savage Orc units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +16% for melee infantry Savage Orc units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sniky iz Bezt
skillTree.description: Forest Goblins usually find themselves allying with Savage Orc tribes as they will get a bigger share of the spoils.

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +3 for melee Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +3 for melee Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +6 for melee Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for melee Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +10 for melee Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for melee Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: A Kunnin Plan
skillTree.description: While all orcs are charging in a straight line, goblins will often try to flank the enemy and attack from the rear... even if itÂ´s only because that maneouver helps them to stay as far as possible from the main fight.

effects.description:
Charge Bonus: +5 for Spider (excluding Arachnorok) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +5 for Spider (excluding Arachnorok) units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +4% for Spider (excluding Arachnorok) units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +10 for Spider (excluding Arachnorok) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +10 for Spider (excluding Arachnorok) units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +8% for Spider (excluding Arachnorok) units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +15 for Spider (excluding Arachnorok) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +15 for Spider (excluding Arachnorok) units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +12% for Spider (excluding Arachnorok) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Betta Huntaz
skillTree.description: Savage Orc tribes depend on hunting to eat and get the scarce clothes they wear, so itÂ´s logic that they have much more practice than other orcs.

effects.description:
Missile Damage: +4% for ranged Savage Orc and Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for ranged Savage Orc and Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +5% for ranged Savage Orc and Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Damage: +8% for ranged Savage Orc and Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for ranged Savage Orc and Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +10% for ranged Savage Orc and Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Damage: +12% for ranged Savage Orc and Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for ranged Savage Orc and Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +15% for ranged Savage Orc and Forest Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Wild Boarz go Fasta
skillTree.description: Boars and Savage Orcs get along well, as they share an identical world-view and remarkably similar personal hygiene habits. This nearly bare brutes can ride through clouds of arrows and emerge unscathed (although perhaps much angrier).

effects.description:
Physical Resistance: +10% for Savage Orc Boar units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +10 for Savage Orc Boar units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +4 for Savage Orc Boar units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resistance: +15% for Savage Orc Boar units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +15 for Savage Orc Boar units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +8 for Savage Orc Boar units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resistance: +20% for Savage Orc Boar units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +20 for Savage Orc Boar units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +12 for Savage Orc Boar units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Da Godz az wiv us
skillTree.description: Be it from Gork, Mork or the Spider God, the presence of this big and wantonly violent creatures is seen as a good omen by all members of the tribe

effects.description:
Charge Bonus: +10% for Monster and Rogue Idol units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +5% for Monster and Rogue Idol units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +4% for Monster and Rogue Idol units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +15% for Monster and Rogue Idol units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +10% for Monster and Rogue Idol units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +8% for Monster and Rogue Idol units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +20% for Monster and Rogue Idol units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +15% for Monster and Rogue Idol units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +12% for Monster and Rogue Idol units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sneaky Stabberz
skillTree.description: The sneakiest and stabbiest gobboes are just as dangerous as the largest, fiercest Orcs.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 15% for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: 'Ard Ladz
skillTree.description: â€˜Ardest of da â€˜Ard. Donâ€™t mess, gottit?

effects.description:
Ward save: 8% for all Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for all Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for all Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Biggest â€˜n' Strongest
skillTree.description: Itâ€™s one fing to be big, but quite anuva to be strong as well!

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Savage Smartz
skillTree.description: Nuffin' smashes harder than a rock fallin' from da sky, except mebbe da Bad Moon, if it were to fall.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Deff From Below
skillTree.description: A wise Boss knows how to lure the enemy into places where they can be ambushed or trapped with mobs that skulk in the tunnels below.

effects.description: Evasion chance when using the Underway: +6%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +16%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +30%

skillTree.name: Raider
skillTree.description: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Looter
skillTree.description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +4%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +8%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +12%

skillTree.name: Ravager
skillTree.description: Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.

skillTree.name: Iron-Hard
skillTree.description: These iron-hard gits are particularly tough and gnarly Greenskins, who - even if wounded - will be up and ready to fight before too long.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for Lords
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Out-Clevering
skillTree.description: Occasionally an Orc will come along who is more "kunning" than the rest. He quickly rises in ranks as his plans end in victory.

skillTree.name: Mob Boss
skillTree.description: A Boss that has the loyalty of the mobs means he doesnâ€™t have to worry so much about "da boring stuff" like tents and bedding, as theyâ€™ll fight for him no matter what.

skillTree.name: Really Green
skillTree.description: Being green meanz ya really mean.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Big Bully
backgroundSkills.description: "Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc recruits
	(own army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Bragga
backgroundSkills.description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.

backgroundSkills.name: Mushroom-Addicted
backgroundSkills.description: "Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

effects.description: Upkeep: -15% for Goblin and Night Goblin units

backgroundSkills.name: Serial Danca
backgroundSkills.description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

backgroundSkills.name: Tortura
backgroundSkills.description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
